description.ko: 한 줄기 빛이 산산조각 나며 드러내는 숨겨진 활기찬 영혼의 해부도입니다.
description.en: The anatomy of a single light beam shattered into its hidden, vibrant soul.

prompt: A complex arrangement of suspended dichroic glass prisms splitting a single beam of pure light into a chaotic spectrum of rainbow caustics. High refractive indices and chromatic aberration. 8k, Octane Render, hyper-realistic glass refraction, raytracing, dramatic volumetric light beams, sharp focus on the spectral dispersion of #FF0080 and #8000FF, and global illumination reflecting off facets.
